extracted_playbook.title: Harden Domain Controllers and Monitor Event Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Harden domain controllers and monitor event logs for ntdsutil.exe and similar process creations.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit and Validate Administrator Privileges Usage
extracted_playbook.description: Audit and validate any use of administrator privileges to confirm the legitimacy of executed commands.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Port Proxy Usage
extracted_playbook.description: Limit port proxy usage within environments and only enable them for the period of time in which they are required.

extracted_playbook.title: Investigate Unusual IP Addresses and Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Investigate unusual IP addresses and ports in command lines, registry entries, and firewall logs to identify other hosts potentially involved in actor actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Perimeter Firewall Configurations
extracted_playbook.description: Review perimeter firewall configurations for unauthorized changes and/or entries that may permit external connections to internal hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Abnormal Account Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Look for abnormal account activity, such as logons outside of normal working hours and impossible time-and-distance logons.

extracted_playbook.title: Forward Log Files to Centralized Logging Server
extracted_playbook.description: Forward log files to a hardened centralized logging server, preferably on a segmented network.
